meanings.definition: Having or showing no pity or compassion; merciless.
meanings.sent1: The ruthless dictator did not care about the people's suffering.
meanings.sent2: The ruthless hunter showed no mercy to the wounded animal.
meanings.sent3: The ruthless chef refused to share her secret recipe with anyone.
meanings.sent4: The storm was ruthless, destroying everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: The ruthless waves crashed against the shore, eroding the cliffs over time.

meanings.sent1: The ruthless bully made fun of the smaller kids every day.
meanings.sent2: The ruthless villain laughed as he caused chaos in the city.
meanings.sent3: The ruthless squirrel stole all the nuts from the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The winter was ruthless, freezing everything in its icy grip.
meanings.sent5: The ruthless sun beat down on the hikers, making them seek shade.
